name: Plumber Alchemist 3XXX
description:
This game is a submission to the SEAJAM - #TeamSeas Game Jam

You are a plumber alchemist in a distant dystopian future. Very few of your kind are still alive and capable. Your mission now is to fix the washing machine using your ancient knowledge.

  • Use your gas burner and freezer to manipulate the potion temperature
  • Apply powders to potions
  • Blame the bad collision

Ending depends on the set of potions you made.

What to expect:

Crisp 2.5D graphics ✨

Overwhelming rules 📝

Fabulous washing machine animation 😍😍😍

Some painful facts:

  • I implemented too much nice things and broke the game in the last moment, so I had to submit early test version. It.. hurts.
  • Freezer is the unity default cube.
  • This game is incredibly buggy and often does weird stuff.
  • Ignore ending tiles in the main menu, they don't do anything.
  • The "Time Essence" ending doesn't work. It's down in the comments if you reeeeaady to see it.
  • If another ending doesn't work for you, leave a comment, I'll send it back.

Credits

Plumber Alchemist: my friend Nikita 👋

Owner: my friend Oleg 👊

Original photo author for the "Secret Ingredient" ending: @sevenstormphotography on Pexels 👍
